title: Need help with my game crashing (6.17)
body:
Hello! Whenever I get out of champ select and into a game, the game freezes at the 00:01 mark. Any ideas on how to fix?

Thanks

replies.body:
Hmm.. If you're running Windows 10, then this is probably caused by the Game DVR feature that was enabled by the new Windows 10 anniversary update. Go ahead and [disable the game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if anything changes.

Let me know if this helped you fix this!

this is happening to me but i have no windows game bar as im on windows 8.1
and no other stuff is crashing me either. its the game right now. wasnt happening before, is after patch 6.17

PC freezes that aren't caused by the game bar issue are likely caused by hardware failure. A good place to start before testing your hardware for issues is to ensure you've checked your local drivers and power settings with our [FPS guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.

That is not my problem. I play other games that require much better hardware without problem. I have a GTX 980 and Intel i-7, 8gb of ram, and I am very familiar with hardware and have run league of legends with much less. I had no problems before the patch and now I do. If I am not mistaken, if something changes for a game I play such as a patch or update, and all of a sudden my game isnt working while I am able to still play all my other normal games without fps drops or freezing, it is usually the patch and not my computer that is the problem.

edit: and yes I have updated all my drivers if you are wondering.

Well if the steps in the FPS guide wasn't able to make a change, then I recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Additionally, I recommend attaching a set of logs with our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to your request, so our techs have more context on the issue.
This was very helpful, I can play league again ! Thanks :)
